scripts.mongodb-start: cross-env DEBUG=notes* MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=chap07 NOTES_MODEL=mongo REQUEST_LOG_FILE=log.txt nodemon --ext js,mjs,css,json ./app.mjs
scripts.sequlz-start: cross-env DEBUG=notes:* SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml NOTES_MODEL=sequelize REQUEST_LOG_FILE=log.txt nodemon --ext js,mjs,hbs,css,json ./app.mjs
scripts.start: REQUEST_LOG_FILE=log.txt  REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common cross-env DEBUG=notes:* nodemon --ext js,mjs,hbs,css,json ./app.mjs
scripts.sqlite3: NOTES_MODEL=sqlite3 SQLITE_FILE=chap07.sqlite3 REQUEST_LOG_FILE=log.txt REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common cross-env DEBUG=notes:* nodemon --ext js,mjs,json,hbs,css ./app.mjs
